entry.title: 90"x132" Purple Crinkle Crushed Taffeta Rectangular Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 12.28 - 280.38 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity:  1 Tablecloth
Material: Crinkle Taffeta
Color: Purple
Size: 90" x 132"
Shape: Rectangular
Thickness: 135 GSM
Hemmed edges for an exquisite look
1 pc, Seamless Design
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Our crinkle taffeta tablecloths have an undeniable and unsurpassed charm that makes simple items look highly fashionable and modish.  Spread it atop your dreary tables or plain, lackluster table covers to achieve the excellence of class and vibrancy. The lovely crinkles accented all over the surface coupled with the impeccable metallic glint of lustrous taffeta will impart an imperial sublimity to your banquet or wedding tables.

Let this exquisite tablecloth enchant the entire ambiance of your special event with its seamless luster and upscale look. Combining the glistening luster of premium quality taffeta with the classy appeal of crinkle design, we present these elegant tablecloths to augment the beauty of your tables.

Create a perfect harmony of elegance and style by complementing these tablecloths with matching taffeta chair covers, table runners, table skirts, chair skirts, chair caps and sashes. 

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Hand wash, Hang dry only.
  • For Tablecloths only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

Their silky, glossy surface makes them simply irresistible. Our ribbon spool has an appealing elegance that will impart a regal feel to whatever you adorn with it. Titivate your simple gifts by crafting elegant bows on wrapped gifts and packages, wedding bouquets and parcel baskets, embellish your scrap book pages and apparels or simply accentuate your home decor items with these shimmering satin ribbons available in a great range of colors and sizes.

entry.title: Pack of 2 | 52"X84" Lavender Soft Velvet Thermal Blackout Curtains With Chrome Grommet Window Treatment Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3160
Type: Curtains
Price: 39.99 - 227.97 (2 variants)

[About]

Fabric: Polyester Velvet
Color: Lavender
Quality: 260 GSM
Ready to Use: Package includes a pair of panels of 52"Wx84" L
The backside color is the same as the front, keeps a good look from outside of the window.
Blocks Up to 90percent of intrusive light
Reduces Unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits
Lush velvet fabric emulates real theater curtains
Each Panel Contains Eight (8) Chrome Grommets
Care Instructions: Hand wash in cold water, line dry. Do not bleach/iron.
Perfect for room divider, pair with backdrop stand
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Add a touch of refined luxury to any space with our latest Designer Blackout Curtain Panels, featuring soft velvet design for a touch of texture. Woven of plush velvet, these deluxe drapes offer groundbreaking triple weave construction that effortlessly blocks up to 99% of UV rays and sunlight and 60% of outside noise from inflowing into your room. Our energy efficient blackout curtains are equipped with 100% thermal insulation to block summer heat and winter chill from affecting your room’s cozy temperature. Bring regal sophistication to your everyday life by outfitting your bedroom, living room, master suite or guest room in an endearing glamour with this chic curtain, showcasing a metallic grommet ring top and an exclusively elite look.

    Additional Information:

    • Fabric: Polyester Velvet
    • Color: Lavender
    • Quality: 260 GSM with Weave technology
    • Blackout Velvet Curtains with Thermal Insulated Polyester Darkening Lining
    • Ready Made: Package includes a pair of panels of 52" W x 84" L | 104" W x 84" L in total.
    • Light Dimming: Blocks up to 90% of light and 80% UV Rays that comes from outside.
    • Sound Dampening: Decreases the outside noise and can get the reflected sound be absorbed easily
    • Energy Smart: Saves Energy by blocking the direct sunlight
    • Easy to Maintain: Quick steam clean calms the fold line, refresh the fabric and keep them looks neat.

Revamp your home décor with this pair of Thermal Grommet Curtain Panels in chic chevron pattern that will instantly give your space a contemporary update. Our innovative Thermal Insulated Curtain Panels are crafted from 100% polyester and feature blackout light filtration that assists in giving you a perfectly tranquil environment to rest easy and also reduce your utility costs by insulating unwanted light, UV rays, noise, heat, and cold. These functional curtains are constructed with blackout fibers interwoven to the curtains fabric, providing a layer of added insulation against light diffusion and outside temperature transfer for energy efficacy qualities. It is so easy now to darken a room for daytime sleep, movie watching, or to prevent sunlight glare, with our 100% Thermal Eyelet Top Curtain Panels.

Mimicking the peerless sheen and sleek gloss of real diamonds, this glam gem will add regal flair and dimension to your arts, crafts, and favors. Design swish apparels and accessories by stitching the trim in the size and design that complement your taste and event. Inspire your guests and friends by swathing your favors, invites, and gifts in the most extravagant manner using this bling trim!

[Information]

Impart a look of elegance and sophistication to your space with our lush sheer organza curtain panels. Crafted from premium quality organza fabric, these panels is a stylish way to maintain privacy while infusing any room with natural sunlight. Keep your homes bright and sunny without worrying about visibility from outside, as our deluxe organza curtains are transparent enough to let fresh air and sunlight through, yet thick enough to provide unparalleled privacy. Pair these with our printed or sequined curtains to create an imperial display, or use these on their own for a touch of graceful simplicity. Easy to install rod pockets let you hang these chic drapes anywhere effortlessly and in flexible opening and closing of the panel. Choose the color to blend naturally with your home interior, augmenting your living room and bedroom windows or French and Sliding Patio doors.

Additional Information:

Same is the case with our enchanting mini rosette table overlays that have that extra lure and charm as that of an elite ballroom.
